metadata.title: AKS Service Account Token Mounted
metadata.description: Detects pods with automountServiceAccountToken enabled in sensitive namespaces.

properties.description: Detects pods with automountServiceAccountToken enabled, which can be exploited for lateral movement.
properties.query:
let SensitiveNamespaces = dynamic(["default", "production", "prod"]);
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "kube-audit"
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| extend log = parse_json(log_s)
| extend verb = tostring(log.verb)
| extend objectRef = log.objectRef
| extend requestObject = log.requestObject
| extend user = log.user
| where verb == "create"
| where objectRef.resource == "pods"
| extend
    PodName = tostring(objectRef.name),
    Namespace = tostring(objectRef.namespace),
    ServiceAccountName = tostring(requestObject.spec.serviceAccountName),
    AutomountToken = tobool(requestObject.spec.automountServiceAccountToken),
    Username = tostring(user.username),
    ClusterName = Resource
| where AutomountToken == true or isnull(AutomountToken)
| where Namespace in (SensitiveNamespaces) or ServiceAccountName != "default"
| where not(Username startswith "system:")
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ClusterName,
    Namespace,
    PodName,
    ServiceAccountName,
    AutomountToken,
    Username
| summarize
    FirstSeen = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated),
    Count = count()
    by ClusterName, Namespace, PodName, ServiceAccountName, Username

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Pod '{{PodName}}' in namespace '{{Namespace}}' has automountServiceAccountToken enabled for service account '{{ServiceAccountName}}'.
